articles.description: Cannes: Park Chan-wook's murder-mystery may not be as opulent as "The Handmaiden," but its bad romance cuts just as deep.
articles.content: Here’s a sentence I never expected to write: The most romantic movie of the year (so far) is a police procedural. Then again, I wasn’t aware that “Oldboy” director Park Chan-wook — whose operatic rev… [+7720 chars]

articles.title: Cybill Shepherd makes rare comments about her former Moonlighting co-star Bruce Willis - Daily Mail
